theText: As a matter of fact, I dowistfully: 'What time are we going to rise tonight?' It is only because we are served by such loyal, devoted and competent people that the place works at all. Then there are the broadcasting people. The essential thing for us to do in consideration of the nation's business is to knock off at a reasonable hour after the decent period of time has been used during trie day.
